Sustainable Wedding Decor: Instead of using traditional floral arrangements, create a stunning display of locally-sourced, dried flowers and greenery. This not only reduces waste but also adds a unique and earthy touch to the ceremony.

Solar-Powered Lighting: Replace traditional lighting sources with solar-powered ones to reduce energy consumption and carbon footprint. This not only saves energy but also adds a modern and eco-friendly touch to the ceremony.

Edible Wedding Favors: Instead of traditional favors, offer guests edible treats that are locally-sourced and organic. This not only reduces waste but also provides a delicious and memorable takeaway for guests.

Recycled Wedding Dress: Design a wedding dress made from recycled materials such as old maps, newspaper, or plastic bottles. This not only reduces waste but also creates a unique and memorable wedding gown.
